metadata.title: Bioness CTD data
metadata.description: CTD temperature, salinity, transmissivity, location, flow and depth from instruments mounted on Bioness nets.
keywords: North Inner Coast (QCS, Hecate, Dixon Inlet and passages)
South Inner Coast (Johnstone, Georgia, JDF, inlets and passages)
